citations.narrative:
There is visible accumulation of light tan dust/powdery debris on counters, shelves, retail items and the main horizontal
hvac conduit and vent near the center of the store. The accumulation of dust is enough to coat a finger when running a
finger over these surfaces, The affected surfaces are in store areas where rescue and adoption cats are allowed to roam
and have direct contact with these surfaces.
Accumulation of dust on surfaces indicates inadequate frequency of cleaning and sanitation of these areas. Accumulated
dust may harbor allergens or pathogens harmful to animals in contact with these areas.
Surfaces of animal facilities must be cleaned and sanitized as often as necessary to reduce disease hazards and meet
husbandry standards.
Correct by 12-26-2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility owner.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(3) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
There is visible accumulation of light tan dust/powdery debris on counters, shelves, retail items and the main horizontal 
hvac conduit and vent near the center of the store. The accumulation of dust is enough to coat a finger when running a 
finger over these surfaces, The affected surfaces are in store areas where rescue and adoption cats are allowed to roam 
and have direct contact with these surfaces. 
Accumulation of dust on surfaces indicates inadequate frequency of cleaning and sanitation of these areas. Accumulated 
dust may harbor allergens or pathogens harmful to animals in contact with these areas. 
Surfaces of animal facilities must be cleaned and sanitized as often as necessary to reduce disease hazards and meet 
husbandry standards. 
Correct by 12-26-2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility owner.
